Class RLSManager

java.lang.Object
  edu.umd.umiacs.cummings.GSBL.RLSManager

public class RLSManager
extends java.lang.Object

Interface with a Globus RLS server using various Globus command line tools.

getPFNs

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getPFNs(java.lang.String LFN)
Query the RLI to find out which LRC, if any, the LFN is registered with. For now, we will assume that only one LRC will be returned, though in the future this can be modified. Then, query the LRC and return a collection of PFNs. If an LRC is returned, the assumption is that there is at least one PFN to consider.

addMapping

public boolean addMapping(java.lang.String LFN,
                          java.lang.String PFN,
                          boolean create,
                          java.lang.String size)
Either create or add an LFN -> PFN mapping in an LRC catalog. returns true if operation was successful
